original_text: Because God is very kind, he has accepted us as right with himself. As a result, we know that we will receive the good things that God has prepared for us. We know that we will live with God for ever.
korean_text: 우리로 그의 은혜를 힘입어 의롭다 하심을 얻어 영생의 소망을 따라 상속자가 되게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: he has accepted us as right with himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리를 자신과 올바른 관계로 받아주셨다

sentences.original_text: we know that we will receive
the good things that God has prepared for us
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 우리를 위해 준비하신 좋은 것들을

sentences.original_text: We know that we will live with God for ever
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 영원히 하나님과 함께 살 것이라는 것을 안다
